05929.mean:
a kind of poison prepared from the bark of ‘timur’ sichuan pepper used in fishing/to poison fish.

माछा मार्नको लागि बहबिस/बोकेटिमुर को बोक्रो पिसेर तयार पारिएको विषविशेष ।

05930.mean:
1. right; authority; possession. 2. rule; administration. 3. place. 4. (place of) residence; lodging.

१. अधिकार । २. शासन । ३. स्थान । ४. वासस्थान ।

05933.mean:
1. seat. 2. chair.

१. स्थान । २. चौकी; बस्ने ठाउँ ; कर्सी ।

05935.mean:
1. seat; place ( to sit down). 2. bed.

१. बस्नेठाउँ; आसन । २. ओछ्यान ।

05937.mean:
cushion of leaves of straw.

खोस्टा वा परालको चकटी (पिरा) ।

05942.mean:
estate; a definite area/region or a group of villages; division of a district.

मौजा; इलाका ।

05945.mean:
1. to sit on sth(wooden stool, chair, small cushion etc). 2. to settle down. 3. to ride (a gorse, bicycle, motor-car etc). 4. to enjoy (authority, right, property etc). 5. to exploit/suppress/oppress.

१. कुनै चीज (पिरा, मेच, चकटी आदि) माथि बस्नु । २. बसोवास/घरजम गर्नु । ३. (घोडा, साइकल, मोटर आदि) चढ्नु । ४. भोग गर्नु । ५. शोषण गर्नु; दल्नु ।

05947.mean:
very sloppy land, unfit for regular cultivation.

भस्मे ।

05949.mean:
1. establishment. 2. foundation (stone). 3. primary.

१. स्थापना । २. जग; आधारशिला । ३. प्राथमिक ।

05950.mean:
to take in one’s right/possession; to take possession.

अधिकारमा लिनु ।

05956.mean:
1. to sit down; to take/have a seat; to stay. 2. to reside; to dwell in; to be located at/in. 3. helping verb denoting a progressive action or state.

१. बस्नु । २. रहनु । ३. कुनै काम पूरा भइ नसकेको अर्थात कार्य भइरहेको अवस्थामा रहेको वा बसेको (रहिरहेको/बसिरहेको छ भनी) अर्थ बुझाउने सहायक क्रिया ।

05957.mean:
agency; mediator.

मध्यस्थता; प्रतिनिधि राखेर गरिने काम वा व्यवसाय; एजेन्सी ।

05962.mean:
1. the Limbu custom of requesting the guests to take/remain in their seats throughout a particular ceremony of purification or wedding ceremony. 2. a kind of chyabrung dance requesting (as in 1 above) guests to take their seat.

१. शुद्धइँकार्य वा विवाहकार्यमा अतिथिगणलाई तोकिएको कार्यक्रमको अवधिभर बसिदिन आग्रह गर्ने लिम्बू दस्तुर । २. उक्त कार्यका लागि गरिने च्याब्रुङ् नृत्यको एक प्रकार ।

05963.mean:
1. settler; native. 2. native; old/native inhabitant.

१. आदिवासी । २. रैथाने ।

05964.mean:
one hundred million; the number and the figure 100,000,000.

दश करोड; दश करोड को सङ्ख्या; १०,००,००,००० को अङ्क ।

05966.mean:
one-eight part/portion of a seer; about 250 gram.

सेरको आठौं भाग; आधा पावा ।

05968.mean:
1. silver coin used while administering an oath to the bride and bridegroom for life-long union between them. 2. earnest money given to the bride before marriage ceremony.

१. लगनको समयमा वर र वधूलई आजीवन विवाह बन्धनमा बाँधी वाचा गराउँदा प्रयोग गरिने चाँदिको टक । २. (विवाहलग्न अघि बेहुलीलाई दिइने) बैना ।

05970.mean:
to dress sb; to fasten/girdle (a belt) on sb.

(पटुका, पेटी आदि कसैलाई) बाँधिदिनु ।

05971.mean:
grandmother (father’s or mother’s mother.

बज्यै; बाबु वा आमाकी आमा; हनूरआमा; बोजू ।

05972.mean:
collective worship conducted for the protection of the village.

गाउँको रक्षाका लागि गरिने सामूहिक पूजा ।

05973.mean:
a customary offering/gift of (money and liquor) made/offered to the grandparents on the occasion of formally informing them of their grandchildren’s marriage.

बाजे-बज्यैलाई नाति-नातिनीको विवाहको जानकारी दिंदा राखिने (रुपैयाँ तथा रक्सीको) दस्तूर ।

05974.mean:
1. incarnation of God in feminine form; power goddess. 2. earth-deity; grandmother goddess; Yasokeni household goddess (one of the names of grandmother goddess).

१. परमात्माको स्त्री रुप अवतार, आदिशक्ति । २. संसारी माई; बूढी बज्यू (देवी); यासोकेनी देवी ।

05983.mean:
1. to be/get digested. 2. to wear/girdle/fasten/put on (a belt).

१. पच्नु । २. (पटुका, पेटी आदि) बाँध्नु वा कस्नु ।

05988.mean:
1. custom of abstaining/forbidding the use of salt, oil, meat etc during mourning. 2. taboo.

१. जुठो पर्दा नून तेल, मासु आदि बारना गर्ने चलन । २. सामाजिक निषेध/वर्जना ।

05990.mean:
evening; in the evening; at dusk/night.

बेलुक; साँझ; बेलुका/साँझ पख ।

05992.mean:
late afternoon; evening; the time form late afternoon until dusk.

साँझ; सन्ध्या; अपरान्ह करीब ४ ५ बजेदेखि बेलुका झमक्क अँध्यारो होउन्जेल सम्मको समय ।

05994.mean:
Venus (seen at night); the Evening star.

बेलुका देखिने शुक्र ग्रह ।

05996.mean:
twilight.

गोधुलिको समय; घाम अस्ताएर अँध्यारो हुनहुन लागेको समय ।

05997.mean:
early night hours; the time from dusk to early night.

बेलुका; साँझ र रात बिचको समय; करीब ६ देखि ८ बजे बिचको समय ।

05998.mean:
1. (of sth) to become powdery. 2. to grind. 3. to sharpen/whet. 4. bring down sth (form the level higher than the speaker).5. (of things and human beings) to cause/make sb to send sth down/below. 6. (of human) to send sb down (from the level higher than the speaker).

१. (वस्तु) धूलोपिठो हुनु । २. पिँध्नु; धूलोपिठो पार्नु । ३. धार लगाउनु उध्याउनु । ४. तल ल्याउनु । ५. तल पठाउनु ; ल्याउन लगाउनु । ६. तल पठाउनु ।

05999.mean:
1. to come-down/descend (from the higher level than the speaker’s). 2. to distill liquor. 3. helping verb denoting to get/have/feel sensation fo (laugh, sleep etc), growing (so), etc.

१. झर्नु/आउनु; (वक्ताको सतहभन्दा अग्लो ठाउँबाट) आउनु । २. (रक्सी) पार्नु । ३. नाम वा क्रिया शब्दका पछाडि जोडिएर (हाँसो, नाद्रा आदि) लाग्नु, (त्यस्तो) बढेर आउनु आदि बुझाउने सहायक क्रियापद ।

06002.mean:
to crush into pieces.

झरामझुरुम पार्नु; झुर्याउनु; ढुट्याउनु ।
